name: Pixel Racers: Online Racing
description:
Pixel Racers : Online Racing is classic game. Let's overcome challenges and complete the race!
The goal is to reach the finish line within the stages without running out of time, hitting other cars or running out of fuel.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 4-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting.

Features:
* Endless Racing.
* Global Leaderboards.
* Great graphics and music.
* Suitable for all ages.
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime.

Enjoy!
